嶘字的基本解释

嶘
zhàn
险峻的山：“大渊蕴蕴兮，绝嶘岌岌。”

嶘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàn］
［《廣韻》士限切，上産，崇。］
亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)特别高。
(2)指特别高险的山。

嶘字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶘； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页319第44
【唐韻】士限切【集韻】阻限切，?音棧。【說文】尤高也。【元結·閔嶺中樂府】大淵薀薀兮，絕嶘岌岌。　【集韻】或作㟞。

嶘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嶘字的起名意思

暂无。

嶘
Basic explanation of words
嶘
zhàn
Precipitous mountain: "The great abyss is full of enthusiasm, and it is absolutely precarious."
嶘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàn］
["Guangyun" scholars limit cutting, high production, Chong. ]
Also known as "1". Also known as "1".
(1) Very high.
(2) Refers to particularly high-risk mountains.
嶘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶘; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 319 44
【Tang Yun】Science limit cut 【Ji Yun】restrain limit cut, sound stack. [Said the text] You Gao also. [Yuan Jie·Minling Zhongyue House] Dayuan is stunned, absolutely awkward.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo 㟞.
